headline.main: Abroad; On the Necessity of a Common Strategy for Peace

lead_paragraph: Like a troop of insistent camp followers, scores of new and troublesome questions gather in the wake of our advance in North Africa. This is inevitable for two reasons. One is that the war balance visibly changes with the appearance of the first American expeditionary force on the Western battlefront.
abstract: A O McCormick comment on Brit-US offensive against Italy
